content: this legal case involves two parties sklep and vrhovno sodišče rs ii dor 3922020 the court determined the amount of money that needed to be paid in the cost procedure in the first instance judgment the court reviewed the data and made a decision the supreme court reviewed the case and awarded compensation the final resolution states that the judgment was made in the first instance the assets involved in the case include real estate furnishings houses cars a tractor and cash in the defendants account the division of assets between the parties is 40 for the plaintiff and 60 for the defendant the court of appeal reviewed the case and made a decision with 35 in favor of the plaintiff and 65 against the losing party applied for a revision to the supreme court but the application was dismissed the laws used in the legal decision were the marriage family relations act and the civil procedure act the court of first instance determined the shares of the coowned property and ordered the defendant to pay a specific amount of money the court of second instance partially modified the judgment changing the shares and rejecting a claim for payment the plaintiff is seeking permission to appeal to the supreme court the court made a decision to reduce the shares of the common and separate property based on the statutory presumption the supreme court dismissed the application for review unanimously

metadata.CASE_ID: Sklep Vrhovnega sodišča RS II DoR 392/2020, 20. 11. 2020
